summary: I haven't seen any made so I thought I'd have a go.
descriptionHtml:
Threw a texture over the top of the nightingale armor and enchanted it. the armor is a set of it's own so the nightingale set is left untouched if you still want to use it. it is craftable. leather for early game set and glass smithing for late game set with better armor and enchantments.

I added tundra cotton the recipe list on top of the leather armor requirements to make it slightly unique and have to venture at least a little to acquire the armor.


and don't forget to endorse if you like :)

just updated the mod. 2.1 file adds female textures and someone pointed out the armor was not standalone from nightingale as I thought it was- this fixes that too. you might have to go into textures and meshes and delete the nightingale armor folders this mod put in as they will do nothing for this mod now. enjoy.

Just added a camo longbow with faster firing rate and slight damage increase from normal longbow and steel arrows with a damage increase as well both with green camo textures. arrows under misc at forge and bow under steel

next update- just added a snow variant. this file does it all so only need that for both if newly downloading :)

been a while so I thought would update based on a sugestion in the comments. now a skaal version of the ghillie suit. pick it up in first room at helgen keep. in next week I will add a snow one and make it craftable instead.Â
author: Riendempsey86
